content.text:
# 12th Canadian Folk Music Awards

-->
| location       = Isabel Bader Theatre, Toronto, Ontario
| country        = Canada
| reward         =
| year           =
| year2          =
| holder         =
| website        = [http://folkawards.ca/ folkawards.ca]

The 12th Canadian Folk Music Awards were presented in Toronto, Ontario on December 3, 2016.
Nominees and recipients
Recipients are listed first and highlighted in boldface.
{| class=wikitable width="100%"
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%" | Traditional Album
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%" | Contemporary Album
|-
| valign="top" |
* 'Yann Falquet and Pascal Gemme, Princes et habitants'
*Ten Strings and a Goat Skin, Auprès du poêle
*The Slocan Ramblers, Coffee Creek
*Vishtèn, Terre rouge
*Fásta, Un Canadien errant
| valign="top" |
* 'David Francey, Empty Train'
*Corin Raymond, Hobo Jungle Fever Dreams
*The Strumbellas, Hope
*Big Little Lions, Just Keep Moving
*Donovan Woods, ''Hard Settle, Ain't Troubled''
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%" | Children's Album
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%" | Traditional Singer
|-
| valign="top" |

*Kathy Reid-Naiman, Welcome Summer

*Nadia Gaudet and Jason Burnstick, Dream Big, Little One / Fais de beaux rêves, petit ange
| valign="top" |
* 'Chaim Tannenbaum, Chaim Tannenbaum'
*Rowen Gallant, Auprès du poêle
*Shannon Quinn, If All the Young Ladies

*Sophie Lavoie (Fásta), Un Canadien errant

| valign="top" |

*Daniel Koulack, Frailing to Succeed

*Lotus Wight, Ode to the Banjo
|-

| valign="top" |
